text.p: What goes in the blank to make a correct statement?
If the matrix [mathjaxinline]A[/mathjaxinline] has [mathjaxinline]\underline{\; \; \; \; \; \; \; \; \; \; }[/mathjaxinline], then there must be a free variable.

font.p: If there are more columns than rows, there can't be a pivot in every column, so there must be a free variable.
